# ACCOMMODATION

May is always high season in Barcelona. We have offered all the options available located at the city centre. All the properties have a meeting room available for the group, with a set up up to 50 people in theatre style maximum. 

Due to the chosen dates are Friday and Saturday (the departure date will be Sunday) the rates will be higher than normal. 

We recommend to base the quote in the hotel Catalonia Plaza Catalunya because: 
** *It is located at the city centre (just few steps from Pl Catalunya)
** *Good value for money 
** *Plenty of possibiities of restaurants and activities within walking distance from the hotel.
